segments.text: May I invite you for a dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You dance well . Do you breakdance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a story about breakdancing in the paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: According to the story , it's some sort of modern dance style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , breakdancing is more a physical exercise than a dance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And disco a kind of nightclub .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , a disco is a place where people dance according to nonstop recorded music ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So ... disco is what the music is called and a disco is a place where people go to dance to it.And breakdancing is a different sort of thing altogether .
segments.speaker: S2
